problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,BC=9,∠ABC的平分线BF交AC于点F,点D、点E分别是边AB、AC上的点,若\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{EF}{EC}=\frac{1}{3},则BD-DE的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BC = N_0, the bisector BF of ∠ABC intersects AC at point F, point D and point E are points on sides AB and AC respectively, if \frac {AD}{AB} = \frac{AE}{AC} = \frac {EF}{EC}=\frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the value of BD-DE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,延长DE,BF交于点G,∵\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{AE}{AC},∠DAE=∠BAC,∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴∠ADE=∠ABC,∴DE∥BC,∴∠CBG=∠DGB,∵∠ABC的平分线BF交AC于点F,∴∠DBG=∠CBG,∴∠DBG=∠DGB,∴BD=DG,∵EG∥BC,∴△EFG∽△CFB,∴\frac{EG}{BC}=\frac{EF}{CF},∵\frac{EF}{CE}=\frac{1}{3},∴EG=\frac{1}{2}BC=4.5,则BD-DE=DG-DE=EG=4.5．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的判定和性质及等腰三角形的判定与性质,正确作出辅助线是解题的关键．
